thread.title: Great intro to the hotel!
thread.title_full: Great intro to the hotel! - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CDay2016
title: Great intro to the hotel!
text: When I arrived at the hotel I only had about 10 minutes before my conference call started. A very kind and efficient welcome and check-in at the hotel by Nick (the bellman) and Peter at the front desk. I was on the call in my room with 2 minutes to spare - even after Nick had explained all the amenities of the hotel! Thanks for the fast and efficient service gentlemen!
